reviewText: Not very stimulating for my 5 year old but I play it at night sometimes while we sleep.  Maybe it will sink in our heads one day.

A friend gave my 3 year old girl the Little Pim Spanish DVDs as a birthday gift this year, and we have absolutely loved it for entertainment and educational purposes.  I would definitely recommend it to parents who don't want their toddlers or younger children watching mindless TV.
